name: run away astronaut
description:
This is a tiny game made for Untitled game jam 11

if you have a good luck and fast reaction you will win in 2 minutes

else you will suffer (^_^)

controllers: 

left and right arrows : to walk

down arrow : to move to the other side of the earth

R button : to restart game

I hpe you will enjoy.

support me on patreon
